Metadata.title: DDW Studio - AI Automation Platform for Enterprise Operations | Voice AI, HR Automation & Fleet Management
Metadata.description: Transform your business operations with DDW Studio's AI automation platform. AI voice assistants, HR automation software, Fleet-OS fleet management, and automated proposal generation. Reduce response times by 95% and boost conversions by 47%.
Metadata.keywords: AI automation platform, enterprise AI software, AI voice assistant for business, HR automation software, fleet management software, automated proposal generator

Hero.subheadline: Automate voice calls, HR operations, fleet management, and proposal generation with enterprise-grade AI.
Hero.subheadlineHighlight: Reduce response times by 95% and increase conversions by 47%.

Stats.subtitle: Real results from real clients. Our AI solutions deliver measurable impact from day one.

Products.subtitle: Four enterprise-grade AI solutions. Each with its own identity, designed to transform specific business operations.
Products.bottomNote: Each product operates as an independent brand with dedicated support and development teams.

product1.name: Lyra AI Voice Assistant
product1.description: Enterprise AI voice assistant that handles inbound and outbound calls with natural conversation, automatic CRM updates, and intelligent call routing. Perfect for sales teams, customer support, and appointment scheduling.

product2.name: HR-OS
product2.description: Intelligent HR automation platform with AI chatbot and voice support. Answers employee questions 24/7, automates HR workflows, and integrates with existing HRIS systems. Reduce HR ticket volume by 80%.

product3.name: Fleet-OS
product3.description: Voice-activated fleet management and dispatch system for logistics operations. AI-powered route optimization, real-time driver coordination, and automated scheduling. Reduce dispatch errors by 92%.

product4.name: AI Proposal Generator
product4.description: AI-powered proposal generation that creates professional sales proposals instantly from CRM data. Voice-activated, customizable templates, and automatic client personalization. Close deals 3x faster.

HowItWorks.subtitle: A proven process that delivers measurable outcomes. Most clients see ROI within the first 30 days.

step1.title: Discovery Call
step1.description: We analyze your operations, identify bottlenecks, and map out exactly where AI can deliver the highest ROI for your business.

step2.title: Custom Integration
step2.description: Our team deploys tailored AI solutions that integrate seamlessly with your existing systems. No disruption, just enhancement.

step3.title: Launch & Scale
step3.description: Go live with confidence. Our AI learns and improves continuously, delivering compounding returns as your business grows.

PrivacyPolicy.metaTitle: Privacy Policy | DDW Studio - Digital Dream Works LLC
PrivacyPolicy.metaDescription: DDW Studio privacy policy. Learn how Digital Dream Works LLC collects, uses, and protects your data in compliance with GDPR and US privacy laws.
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Digital Dream Works LLC ("DDW Studio", "we", "us", or "our") operates ddwstudio.com. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

s1.title: Information We Collect
s1.p1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as:
s1.b1: Name and email address when you request a demo or contact us
s1.b2: Company name and job title when you fill out forms
s1.b3: Payment information when you subscribe to our services
s1.b4: Communications you send us via email or contact forms
s1.p2: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:
s1.b6: Pages visited and time spent on each page

s2.title: How We Use Your Information
s2.p1: We use the information we collect to:
s2.b1: Provide, maintain, and improve our AI automation platform
s2.b2: Process transactions and send related information
s2.b3: Send technical notices and support messages
s2.b4: Respond to your comments and questions
s2.b6: Monitor and analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
s2.b7: Detect and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities

s3.title: Information Sharing
s3.p1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
s3.b1: Service providers who assist us in operating our platform
s3.b3: Law enforcement when required by law
s3.b4: Successor entities in the event of a merger or acquisition

s4.title: Data Security
s4.p1: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information including AES-256 encryption for data at rest and in transit, secure HTTPS connections, regular security audits, and access controls. While we take reasonable precautions, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

s5.title: Cookies
s5.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience. See our Cookie Policy at ddwstudio.com/cookies for details. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

s6.title: Your Rights
s6.p1: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
s6.b1: Access the personal information we hold about you
s6.b3: Request deletion of your personal data
s6.b4: Object to processing of your personal data
s6.p2: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

s7.title: GDPR (European Users)
s7.p1: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Our lawful basis for processing your data is consent, contract performance, or legitimate interests. You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

s8.title: Data Retention
s8.p1: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your information within 30 days.

s9.title: Third-Party Links
s9.p1: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites and encourage you to review their privacy policies.

s10.title: Children's Privacy
s10.p1: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

s11.title: Changes to This Policy
s11.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

s12.title: Contact Us
s12.p1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:
s12.address: Digital Dream Works LLC, Florida, USA

TermsOfService.metaTitle: Terms of Service | DDW Studio - Digital Dream Works LLC
TermsOfService.metaDescription: DDW Studio terms of service. Review the terms and conditions governing use of DDW Studio's enterprise AI automation platform and services.
TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using DDW Studio's enterprise AI automation platform operated by Digital Dream Works LLC.

s1.title: Acceptance of Terms
s1.p1: By accessing or using DDW Studio ("the Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Platform. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and customers.

s2.title: Description of Service
s2.p1: DDW Studio provides enterprise AI automation software including Lyra AI Voice Assistant, HR-OS HR Automation Software, Fleet-OS Fleet Management System, and AI Proposal Generator. Features and pricing are subject to change with notice.

s3.title: Account Registration
s3.p1: To access certain features, you must register for an account. You agree to:
s3.b2: Maintain the security of your password
s3.b3: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
s3.b4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

s4.title: Acceptable Use
s4.p1: You agree not to use the Platform to:
s4.b1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
s4.b3: Transmit harmful, offensive, or disruptive content
s4.b4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any systems
s4.b5: Interfere with the proper functioning of the Platform
s4.b6: Reverse engineer or copy our AI models or software

s5.title: Payment Terms
s5.p1: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as stated in our refund policy. We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days notice.

s6.title: Intellectual Property
s6.p1: The Platform and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Digital Dream Works LLC and are protected by US and international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of data you input into the Platform.

s7.title: Data and Privacy
s7.p1: Your use of the Platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy at
s7.p2: By using the Platform, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy.

s8.title: Limitation of Liability
s8.p1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Digital Dream Works LLC shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the Platform. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you in the 12 months preceding the claim.

s9.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
s9.p1: The Platform is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We do not warrant that the Platform will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses. We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of any AI-generated content.

s10.title: Termination
s10.p1: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties. Upon termination, your right to use the Platform will cease immediately.

s11.title: Governing Law
s11.p1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Florida.

s12.title: Changes to Terms
s12.p1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or prominent notice on the Platform. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

s13.title: Contact
s13.p1: Questions about these Terms? Contact us at:
s13.address: Digital Dream Works LLC, Florida, USA

CookiePolicy.metaTitle: Cookie Policy | DDW Studio - Digital Dream Works LLC
CookiePolicy.metaDescription: DDW Studio cookie policy. Learn how we use cookies and tracking technologies on our enterprise AI platform and how to manage your preferences.
CookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Digital Dream Works LLC uses cookies and similar technologies on ddwstudio.com.

s1.title: What Are Cookies
s1.p1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, understand how you use the site, and improve your experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Always Active)
essential.subtitle: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.subtitle: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
analytics.b1: Google Analytics - page views, traffic sources

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies (Optional)
marketing.subtitle: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

s3.title: Managing Cookies
s3.b1: Our cookie consent banner (appears on first visit)
s3.b2: Your browser settings - most browsers allow you to refuse cookies
s3.b3: Third-party opt-out tools (Google Analytics Opt-out, etc.)
s3.p2: Note: Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.

s4.title: Third-Party Cookies
s4.p1: Some cookies are placed by third-party services on our pages. We do not control these cookies. Please review the respective privacy policies of these third parties.

s5.title: Cookie Retention
s5.p1: Session cookies expire when you close your browser. Persistent cookies remain for a defined period (typically 1-2 years) or until you delete them.

s6.title: Updates to This Policy
s6.p1: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically. The updated date at the top of this page indicates when it was last revised.

s7.title: Contact
s7.p1: Questions about our cookie practices? Contact: privacy@ddwstudio.com

About.metaTitle: About DDW Studio | Enterprise AI Automation Platform | Digital Dream Works LLC
About.metaDescription: DDW Studio is the enterprise AI division of Digital Dream Works LLC, a Florida-based technology company. Building AI automation products that transform business operations across voice, HR, logistics, and sales.

hero.title: About DDW Studio
hero.subtitle: The enterprise AI division of Digital Dream Works LLC, building intelligent automation products that transform how businesses operate.

story.h2: The AI Evolution of Digital Dream Works
story.p1: DDW Studio is the enterprise AI products division of Digital Dream Works LLC, a Florida-based technology company. We began as a full-service digital agency helping businesses with marketing systems, web development, and custom software. As AI became transformative, we made a strategic pivot — dedicating a division entirely to building enterprise-grade AI automation products.
story.p2: Today, DDW Studio builds four independent AI-powered SaaS products, each targeting a specific operational bottleneck that costs businesses time and money every single day.

studio.title: DDW Studio — Enterprise AI Products Division
studio.description: Four independent SaaS products (Lyra, HR-OS, Fleet-OS, Proposal Gen), each with its own brand, domain, and dedicated team. Built for enterprise clients who need AI that works at scale.

agency.title: Digital Dream Works Agency — Professional Services Division
agency.description: Retainer-based client services including marketing systems, web development, custom software, and AI automation.

products.p: Four enterprise AI products built to automate your most critical operations:
products.lyra: Lyra AI Voice Assistant — AI-Powered Call Automation
products.proposal: AI Proposal Generator — Automated Sales Proposal Software

v1.title: Results First
v1.description: We measure success by your ROI, not our output

v2.title: Enterprise Quality
v2.description: Built to the standards of Fortune 500 companies

v3.title: Honest Technology
v3.description: We only claim what our AI can actually deliver

v4.title: Client Partnership
v4.description: Your success is our business model

cta.p: Schedule a demo and see how DDW Studio's AI automation platform can reduce costs and drive growth.

Lyra.metaTitle: Lyra AI Voice Assistant | AI-Powered Call Automation | DDW Studio
Lyra.metaDescription: Lyra is an enterprise AI voice assistant that handles inbound and outbound calls with natural conversation, automatic CRM updates, and intelligent routing. Reduce call response times by 95%.

hero.title: Meet Lyra
hero.description: Enterprise AI voice assistant that handles inbound and outbound calls with natural conversation, automatic CRM updates, and intelligent call routing. Perfect for sales teams, customer support, and appointment scheduling.

items.inbound: Inbound Call Handling: Answers calls instantly, 24/7, with natural conversation
items.outbound: Outbound Campaigns: Automated follow-ups, appointment reminders, and sales calls
items.crm: CRM Integration: Automatically logs every call, updates records, and creates tasks
items.routing: Intelligent Routing: Routes complex calls to the right human agent instantly
items.scheduling: Appointment Scheduling: Books, confirms, and reschedules without human input
items.multiLang: Multi-language Support: Handles calls in English and Spanish (more coming)

useCases.sales: Sales Teams: Automate follow-ups and qualification calls
useCases.support: Customer Support: Handle high call volumes without adding headcount
useCases.healthcare: Healthcare: Appointment scheduling and patient reminders
useCases.realestate: Real Estate: Property inquiries and showing scheduling
useCases.financial: Financial Services: Client outreach and appointment setting

integrations.list: Salesforce | HubSpot | Microsoft Dynamics | Zoho CRM | Custom APIs

cta.p: Schedule a live demo and watch Lyra handle real calls in your industry.

FleetOS.metaTitle: Fleet-OS | AI Fleet Management System | DDW Studio

hero.title: Fleet-OS
hero.description: Voice-activated fleet management and dispatch system for logistics operations. AI-powered route optimization, real-time driver coordination, and automated scheduling. Reduce dispatch errors by 92%.

items.voice: Voice Dispatch: Dispatchers control entire fleet with voice commands
items.route: AI Route Optimization: Real-time routing based on traffic, weather, and priorities
items.coordination: Driver Coordination: Automated assignment and real-time communication
items.tracking: Fleet Tracking: Live GPS tracking of every vehicle in your fleet
items.scheduling: Automated Scheduling: AI builds and optimizes driver schedules automatically
items.delivery: Delivery Confirmation: Automated proof of delivery and customer notifications
